text: Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata gata wa, watashi no yurushi mo enai uchi ni kare o shinjiru no ka. Kitto kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta, anata gata no shuchodearou. Daga, yagate omoishirudearou. Watashi wa kanarazu anata gata no te to ashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shi, anata gata o, subete haritsuke no kei ni surudearou
